node.title: Ultralight plane crashes in Perth, in second such incident in under a month
node.alt: A damaged ultra light plane lying on dirt.
node.description: An ultralight plane crashes on the outskirts of Perth, leaving two people in hospital with what are believed to be non-life-threatening injuries.
node.content:
["An ultralight plane with two people on board has crash-landed in a field in Hopeland on the outskirts of Perth.\u00a0", "A man, 77,\u00a0and a woman, 65, have been taken to hospital. Their injuries are not believed to be life-threatening.", "Firefighters and police rushed to the scene\u00a0near Yangedi Road, which runs alongside the Serpentine Airfield.", "Video footage from the crash site shows only one of the plane's wings is still attached.", "The incident took place about 10:00am on Saturday.", "It is the second incident of its type in Perth in less than a month.", "About three weeks ago, a light plane ditched into the ocean off a popular Perth beach.", "Both the pilot and his passenger escaped with minor injuries.", "", "
Light plane crashes into ocean off City Beach in Perth
"]
